title: Bontrager retreads super fast XR1, introduces all new mega aggressive SE6 enduro tire & more
content:
If you’re thinking about some new rubber for your mountain bike — stay tuned. Bontrager just dropped a slew of new tires ranging from cross country race to the most aggressive tire they’ve created — plus the prices are lower than all previous models. So what would an Olympic year be without tons of new […]

The post Bontrager retreads super fast XR1, introduces all new mega aggressive SE6 enduro tire & more appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
